Text.val: -- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Start producing XML File if no error occured (Transaction level)
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)

ExpSyntax.val: 'and INVS_TRADINGTIMESTAMP > (select max(SCUT_CUTOFFTIME) from '& Trim({32768,9})& '/SCUT where SCUT_ADMNO = INVS_ADMNO and SCUT_CLNTNO = INVS_CLNTNO and SCUT_CUTOFFTIME <= '& ''''& Trim({1,14})&''''&')'
'and (INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE > '&''''&DStr({1,15},'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&' or INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE is null)'&' and INVS_FINANCEDATE <= '&''''&DStr({1,15},'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 :3 :4 and INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 :5 group by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE order by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE for fetch only

select INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 :3 :4 and INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 :5 group by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE order by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE for fetch only

select INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, cast(INVS_DISCOUNTRATEDEM as decimal(10,6)), cast(INVS_INTERESTBASERATE as decimal(10,6)), cast(INVS_INTERESTMARGIN as decimal(10,6)), cast(INVS_INTERESTPERCENTAGE as decimal(10,6)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 :3 :4 and INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 :5 group by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, INVS_DISCOUNTRATEDEM, INVS_INTERESTBASERATE, INVS_INTERESTMARGIN, INVS_INTERESTPERCENTAGE order by INVS_CURRENCY, INVS_CLNTNO, INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE, INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE, INVS_DISCOUNTRATEDEM, INVS_INTERESTBASERATE, INVS_INTERESTMARGIN, INVS_INTERESTPERCENTAGE for fetch only

select INVS_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER, min(INVS_CURRENCY), min(INVS_CLNTNO), min(INVS_EXPECTEDPAYMENTDATE), min(INVS_FINALPAYMENTDATE), cast(min(INVS_DISCOUNTRATEDEM) as decimal(10,6)), cast(min(INVS_INTERESTBASERATE) as decimal(10,6)), cast(min(INVS_INTERESTMARGIN) as decimal(10,6)), cast(min(INVS_INTERESTPERCENTAGE) as decimal(10,6)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVS_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTAMOUNT - INVS_DISCOUNTVATAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - INVS_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)), min(INVS_TRADINGTIMESTAMP) from :1/INVS where INVS_ADMNO = :2 :3 :4 and INVS_CLNA_ID > 0 :5 group by INVS_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER order by INVS_FUNDINGREQUESTNUMBER for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({13,5})& ASCIIChr (13)& ASCIIChr (10)& ASCIIChr (13)& ASCIIChr (10)&'Pending funding requests in MQ258'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_ADMNO = :2 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :3 and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 group by SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_COMMISSIONRATEDEM order by SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_COMMISSIONRATEDEM for fetch only

select cast(sum (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT - SFEX_COMMISSIONAMOUNTDEM - SFEX_COMMISSIONVATAMOUNTDEM) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_ADMNO = :2 and SFEX_CLNTNO = :3 and SFEX_SCFH_NO = :4 and SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC > 0 and exists (select * from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID = 258 and MQDT_ADMNO = SFEX_ADMNO and MQDT_CLNTNO = SFEX_CLNTNO and MQDT_INVO_NO = SFEX_SCFH_NO) group by SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_COMMISSIONRATEDEM order by SFEX_CURRENCY, SFEX_DUEDATE, SFEX_COMMISSIONRATEDEM for fetch only

Text.val: ... first add the XML header part to the final XML file
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
